hints.delete: Delete your account won't delete your videos. You must delete your videos before deleting your account if we want so.

content.title: My videos
content.description: Here is the list of your videos. On this page, you can edit them, delete them.

content.title: My modules
content.description: Here is the list of your modules. On this page, you can edit them, delete them or consult their content.

content.title: My quizzes
content.description: Here is the list of your quizzes. On this page, you can edit them, delete them or consult their results.

content.title: My courses
content.description: Here is the list of your courses. On this page, you can edit them, delete them or consult their content.

content.title: My attachments
content.description: Here is the list of your attachments. On this page, you can edit or delete them, or just click on them.
